name: Silver Nights - FNaF Fan game
description: Welcome to yet another Freddy Fazbear pizzeria! Your job here as a night guard would be easy, right? What about the animatronics? Pfft, They're just a bunch of robots. It's like they gonna start walking and try to kill you or something like that, Of course not! The only real concern is the ventilation system. It's very dirty and always failing to function! and the generator is always running out of gas! I wish they'd pay me quicker but 5 nights is 5 nights... Can I get to it? Maybe? Download and find out if you can survive the Silver nights!
